title: Carmen [DeMille]
creator_credit: Cecil B. DeMille and David Zucker
brief_description: The story that inspired Bizet’s immortal opera is here dramatically recreated with Metropolitan Opera diva Geraldine Farrar as the eponymous, seductive Carmen. Bizet’s score is performed by the London Philharmonic Orchestra. Cast also includes Wallace Reid, Pedro de Cordoba and Horace B Carpenter.
